on: [push]
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@master
      - name: whatsapp-notify
        id: whatsapp-notify
        env:
          account_sid: ${{AC7d075a8a3e54bd7c26e9a3a4677ce787}}
          auth_token: ${{450def635b98653f6471ee7c7b0c8814}}
          to_whatsapp_no: ${{ secrets.to_whatsapp_no }}


        uses: Edwin-J/whatsapp-push-notify-action@master
      
      - name : Run
        run: |
          echo 'Start!'
